original_title: I am not a Number: Alejandra
overview: An intimate documentary portrait series in which five transgender women take space to tell their own often sidelined stories in their own often silenced words. Each woman shares her experiences of migration, the struggles she faces, and where she finds strength. I am not a Number: Alejandra is the first in the series.“The story I will share with you, albeit sad, is about love for life and a very human resilience to survive despite the odds.” – Alejandra
title: I am not a Number: Alejandra
